alert.note: Alert for Charles City; Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; James City; Newport News; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 8:47PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of southeastern Gloucester, southeastern Charles City, York, James City, and northeastern Surry Counties, the southwestern City of Poquoson, the City of Hampton, the City of Newport News and the City of Williamsburg through 930 PM EST... At 846 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near Holdcroft to near Rustic to Burrowsville. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Williamsburg, Claremont, Surry, Queens Lake, Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, Norge, Gloucester Point, College Of William And Mary, Christopher Newport University, Patrick Henry Field, Seaford, Toano, Busch Gardens, Rustic, Carver Gardens, Tabb, Kings Point and Jamestown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Charles City; Gloucester; Hampton, Poquoson; James City; Newport News; Surry; York
